metadata.name: Feedback Request
metadata.description: Collect customer reviews and feedback 24-48 hours after purchase or delivery. Builds social proof and improves service quality.

blocks.content:
Hi {customerName},

Thank you for your recent purchase of {productName}. We hope you're enjoying it!
Could you take 30 seconds to share your experience? Your feedback helps us improve and helps other customers make informed decisions.

How was your experience?

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Excellent
⭐⭐⭐⭐ Good
⭐⭐⭐ Average
⭐⭐ Fair
⭐ Poor
Your honest review helps small businesses like ours thrive. Thank you for your support!

Having an issue with your order?
Contact our support team directly at support@example.com

We're here to help make things right.

With gratitude,
The {companyName} Team
